GPIO.description: PB6..7 are not routed out. These are connected to the on-board crystal. PC4..5 are routed out to off grid header, not available on either side of the board.

XTAL.description: The crystal (8/16/20MHz) with capacitors are on the board, pins (PB6..7) not routed out.

RESET.description: Connected to on-board switch, pulled up with a 10k resistor, and connected to GRN output through a capacitor.

ADC.description: ADC6..7 are routed out to off grid header, not available on either side of the board.

USART.description: Routed out also at the top (according to the image) for easy connection to an FTDI module.

RST.description: Connected to on-board switch, pulled up with a 10k resistor, and connected to GRN output through a capacitor.

A6.description: Routed out to off-grid breakout header.

A7.description: Routed out to off-grid breakout header.

A4.description: Routed out to off-grid breakout header.

A5.description: Routed out to off-grid breakout header.

VCC.description: Connected to on-board voltage regulator. If input voltage comes from RAW pin, then this is a regulated source. Otherwise this is the 3V3/5V input voltage.

RAW.description: Raw power input directed to on-board voltage regulator.

GRN.description: Connected to RST through a capacitor.
